scripts.all: yarn codegen && yarn build && yarn create && yarn deploy
scripts.all-test: yarn codegen && yarn build-test && yarn create-test && yarn deploy-test
scripts.deploy: graph deploy beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8020 --ipfs http://161.35.246.70:5001 --network beam
scripts.build-test: yarn cfg-test; graph build --network beamtest; yarn cfg-test-end
scripts.deploy-test: yarn cfg-test; graph deploy beamswap --node http://161.35.246.70:8020 --ipfs http://161.35.246.70:5001 --network beamtest; yarn cfg-test-end
